name: eddrit
description: Eddrit is an alternative, privacy-friendly web client for Reddit. It focuses on a fast, clutter-free interface without heavy tracking scripts, allowing users to browse posts and comments from a self-hosted or public instance.
features: Privacy-Friendly: Browse Reddit without heavy tracking scripts. Protect your privacy.
Fast Interface: Clutter-free design for quick browsing. Smooth user experience.
No Account Required: Read posts and comments anonymously. Hassle-free access.
Clean Design: Focus on content without distractions. Better reading experience.
Self-Hosted: Run your own Reddit client. Complete independence.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage for fast loading. Efficient browsing.
